segments.text: Nice to see you ; how have you been feeling lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been feeling great , Dr . Smith .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am happy that you have decided to come in for your annual physical .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am going on a cross-country bike ride on vacation and want to make sure that I don ’ t have any problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are going to look at your heart and lungs , do a few blood tests , and see that your eyes , ears , and nose are all working as they should .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been having trouble with congestion in my chest . Can you give me some tests for that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can do a chest X-ray to check for congestion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be great . What is the blood test for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The blood test is for cholesterol , white blood cell count , and blood sugar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been feeling great . I don ’ t imagine that any of my tests will turn out badly .
segments.speaker: S2
